entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
